title: Social Media and Jobs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/28/20
itunes:title: Social Media and Jobs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/28/20
description:
George Noory and technology expert Hilarie Gamm explore her work on the changes to social media that may filtering which political messages get to the public, as well as how American companies are outsourcing jobs to foreign workers and challenging recent college graduates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
